item.title: Saving Lockdown
item.description: Emergency surgery on the Xbox Kinect Phew! Tonight I saved lockdown in our household by fixing the Xbox Kinect :) Not many people seam to care or use the Kinect anymore, it was ahead of it’s time and never really got the traction it deserved. However, Just Dance 2021 (and previous versions) still supports it on the Xbox One. Just Dance screen time is one I don’t mind the kids having, I’m an ex-breaker, so always happy to encourage dancing and listening to music.
